featured.text: Seventy-five million pieces of mail can end up in these offices in one year.
They can store dozens, sometimes hundreds, of images that can be printed easily at home or sent by e-mail.
Applicants should meet the requirements: Interested candidates please apply immediately with (1) Taiwan citizen resume and mail to P.O. box 594.
Disks are usually sent to the Disk Doctor by post, but sometimes people are in such a hurry that they cannot wait for the mail to come.

other.text: The staff in a dead mail office may open a package in order to find .
Initial contact is made via e-mail, with subsequent communication usually by phone.
The passage indicates that dead mail auctions are held .
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a way to deal with dead mail?
Dead mail will also be listed on a computer so that people can call in and check to see if a missing item is there.
Every three months, the public is invited to the offices and bins containing items found in dead mail packages are sold to the highest bidder.
First of all, they look for clues that can help them deliver the mail; they open packages in the hope that something inside will show where the package came from or is going to.
When a lot of dead mail has piled up, the dead mail offices hold public auctions.
However, all of this mail cannot simply be stored forever; there is just too much of it.
The post office cannot just throw the mail away, so it becomes “dead mail.”
Dead mail is sent to one of the U.S. Postal Service’s dead mail offices in Atlanta, New York, Philadelphia, St. Paul, and San Francisco.
Thanks, but I think I’ll wait until the mail .
Sometimes it is impossible to deliver all the mail that arrives at the post office.
The staff of the dead mail offices has a variety of ways to deal with all of these pieces of dead mail.
E-mail plays a ______ role in modern communication.

definition.zh_def: 郵件，通常指通過郵政系統發送的信件或包裹。
definition.en_def: A system for sending letters and packages from one place to another, or the letters and packages themselves.
definition.example: I received a mail from my friend yesterday.
